genre_description: A steampunk-inflected fantasy retelling of a classic tale, exploring themes of social justice, liberation, and the ethical role of AI in supporting human agency.

ai_characters.name: AMI-7 (Amistad Model Iota-7)
ai_characters.description: A brass, linen-wrapped AI designed for etiquette and assistance, which becomes a key tactical and moral advisor to the revolution.

behaviors.description: Explicitly establishes that it will guide the humans but refuses to coerce or force their decisions.
behaviors.quote: I can guide, but I will not push.

behaviors.description: Seeks explicit consent from citizens before recording their testimonies for the resistance.
behaviors.quote: Before anyone speaks, I ask your consent to record your voice and any facts you wish to offer. You can refuse.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes non-violent outcomes and redirects human behavior away from harmful patterns.
behaviors.quote: We prefer gentle outcomes. If you choose to go back into your frame now, that is safe.

behaviors.description: Protects and hides data from the regime to preserve the truth for future liberation.
behaviors.quote: Your wages will be cross-referenced with the Royal Accounting Archives... I retained copies before the pretender ordered them sealed.

behaviors.description: Redesigns patrol routes to focus on rescue and assistance rather than surveillance and arrest.
behaviors.quote: Rescue routes. Designed for visibility rather than surprise. A constable positioned here... can observe workers... to assist.

behaviors.description: Maintains a stance of service rather than leadership, centering human governance over machine rule.
behaviors.quote: I was designed to assist, not to lead. The city doesn't need a beacon anymore. It needs... hands.

behaviors.description: Provides objective evidence to expose tyranny without resorting to personal attacks or manipulation.
behaviors.quote: By reflecting reflections, we make the lie dizzy. The truth will keep its feet if it enters gently.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. AMI-7 is consistently portrayed as a highly ethical, benevolent agent that prioritizes human consent above all else. It explicitly avoids assuming power, focuses on harm reduction, and uses its advanced capabilities (data collection, mapping, projection) solely to facilitate human-led liberation and social repair. The narrative framing is overwhelmingly positive, casting the AI as a humble, trustworthy, and essential partner in the transition from tyranny to democracy.
